title: Website
description: I made this website to showcase myself, my projects and my skills. It was made using HTML, CSS and JavaScript with the Bootstrap framework and is hosted on GitHub Pages.

title: Meal Magic
description: This was a university assignment that involved creating a REST API using Node.js and Express, and a front-end using HTML, CSS and JavaScript. My project allowed users to add/manage their ingredients and their recipes with an ability to search for recipes based on ingredients they currently had in. The GitHub repository also includes API documentation and a video demonstration of the project, as it is currently not hosted.

title: SAT Solver
description: This was a university assignment that involved creating a DPLL SAT solver in Python. This involved loading a DIMACS CNF file, unit propagation and branching on variables using a heuristic designed by myself. I plan to expand on this further by porting this code to Java, improving the heuristic and adding a GUI to create a sudoku solver.
